line_2: Flies to hide her hated head.

line_1: Dropp'd on one knee, his frantic arms outspread,
line_2: And stole a guilty glance toward the bed;

line_1: No dirge slow-chanted, and no pall out-spread;
line_2: When o'er the friendless bier no rites were read,

line_1: Chase with quick step, and eager arms outspread,
line_2: The pausing Butterfly from mead to mead;
